Arrow.signature: constructor(start: THREE.Vector3, end: THREE.Vector3, config?: Style);

Circle.summary: A shape consisting of all points at a fixed distance from a given center.

Ellipse.signature: constructor(radiusA?: number, radiusB?: number, config?: Style);

Line.signature: constructor(start: THREE.Vector3, end: THREE.Vector3, config?: Style);

Point.summary: A small circle representing a precise location in space.
Point.signature: constructor(position?: THREE.Vector2 | THREE.Vector3, config?: Style & { radius?: number; });

Polygon.summary: A shape made up of line segments connected to form a (usually) closed shape.

Polyline.summary: A series of connected line segments.

Rectangle.summary: A shape with four sides and four right angles.
Rectangle.signature: constructor(width?: number, height?: number, config?: Style);

Shape.summary: An abstract class representing a generalized shape.

Square.summary: A shape with four sides of equal length and four right angles.

Curve.summary: A curve described by an equation.
